fullplot: Romantic, obsessive Steve Thompson is drawn back to L.A. to make another try for Anna, his former wife. However, Anna belongs now to the L.A. underworld. Steve believes he can rescue her, ignoring the advice and warnings of people who would try to save him. He commits himself to a dangerous course of action that quickly takes everyone somewhere unintended.
plot: An armored truck driver and his lovely ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.
title: Criss Cross
